task.title: How to start working with your vendors

step.cmd: Creating an account for a new LSP

substep.cmd: Users -> LSPs -> Add LSPs -> (podajemy nazwę LSP, np. Supercontext, dane osoby kontaktowej od strony LSP, jej mail; NIE MUSIMY PODAWAĆ Project Coordinatora – to jest osoba od nas, która będzie się zajmować danym LSP)
Zaznaczamy w Connection tylko „We send tasks to this LSP” !
Możemy ustawić dla niego Rate cards, Languages i Access rights

step.cmd: Setting up an LSP account in XTM

substep.cmd: You receive invitation email from XTM
Click on „click here” link in the email (marked in red)
Fill in the website form and click „Next”. 4. You will get an email with login details.
Open XTM website following the link in your email
Go to: -> Settings -> Security -> Computer activation level -> click on “None” and save.
Fill in client company's details (name of the company/contact email to TPC)

Go to “Connection” on the left toolbar (LSP Editor –CLIENT): A) Mark only “We receive tasks from this LSP” B) Fill in “Connection information from the LSP” with details from welcome email C) Click on “Save”

taskbody.result: The connection is established. CLIENT is set as one of your LSP Now you will receive projects from the CLIENT. When the new project is available, you will get an email with notification and the project will be visible in “Projects” tab
